Title: JBrute
Description:
JBrute is a stand-alone English→Japanese and Japanese →English dictionary lookup program.

It's written in C# using WPF

It's very simple to use and fairly full-featured (key-by-key lookup, examples, kanji stroke order diagrams).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
JBrute is a stand-alone (no Internet connection required) English→Japanese and Japanese →English dictionary lookup program.

It's written in C# using WPF
